Custom Mario Size [Divengerss]

29AFE268 2C44003F
31000000 00000008
00120000 XXXXXXXX
30000000 270B3A40
29AFE268 2C44003F
12100000 00000008
13100000 0000000C
13100000 00000010
D0000000 DEADCAFE

X = Float value

Force Specific Action [Divengerss]
30000000 270B3A40
2A48BD60 2CE64FAF
31000000 00000364
00120000 000000XX
D0000000 DEADCAFE

X = Value
0 = none
1 = Stopped
2 = Falling
3 = Jumping
4 = Jump reception (invisible)
5 = sneaked
6 = ?
7 = WTF is that
8 = ?
9 = sneaked again
A = do something but what ?
B = ?
C = ?
D = ?
E = ?
F = falling reception
10 = ?
11 = Wall Jump (Rocket Mario)
12 = ?
13 = stop jump animation
14 = Moon gravity + freeze all other animation
15 = ?
16 = drop fire ball (must have a flower power up. Rapid Fire Balls)
17 = ?
18 = ?
19 = ?
1A = keep current animation & rapid reception
1B = ?
1C = Yeeaaah !!!!
1D = ?
1E = ?
1F = crash sound I think...
20 = ?
21 = ?
33 = JUMP JUMP JUMP
37 = Moon gravity again
3A = Ending Flag (You can't win)
3B = After win walk (You can't die in the void)
3C = Flag jump
3D = sneaked
44 = Pipe (Exit, invisibility)
45 = Pipe (Exit to left)
46 = Pipe (Enter)

Invincibility [Divengerss]
09000000 102F48AA
00000001 00000000
30000000 270B3A40
2A48BD60 2CE64FAF
31000000 00002044
00120000 0000020C
D0000000 DEADCAFE

*Use D-Pad Down

00120000 00000004
D0000000 DEADCAFE

*D-Pad up = Flower / D-Pad down = Hight Jump / D-pad left = (glide) / D-pad right = Heli

Rapid Fire Balls [Divengerss]
30000000 270B3A40
2A48BD60 2CE64FAF
31000000 00000364
00120000 00000016
D0000000 DEADCAFE
